Policy Building and Staging
===========================

In the module you will continue to build your policy using production traffic and
you will learn about policy staging.

Objective:
----------

-  Demonstrate SQL Injection
-  Demonstrate Forceful Browsing
-  Signature staging behavior
-  Estimated time for completion: **30 minutes**

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :glob:

   lab*
